Detailed Description

Functions for AGL (RGMII) initialization, configuration, and monitoring.

Function Documentation

int __cvmx_helper_agl_enable ( int  interface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bringup and enable a RGMII interface. After this call packet I/O should be fully functional. This is called with IPD enabled but PKO disabled.

Parameters:
interface Interface to bring up
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_agl_enumerate ( int  xiface  ) 
cvmx_helper_link_info_t __cvmx_helper_agl_link_get ( int  ipd_port  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Return the link state of an IPD/PKO port as returned by auto negotiation. The result of this function may not match Octeon's link config if auto negotiation has changed since the last call to cvmx_helper_link_set().

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to query
Returns:
Link state
int __cvmx_helper_agl_link_set ( int  ipd_port,
cvmx_helper_link_info_t  link_info 
)

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Configure an IPD/PKO port for the specified link state. This function does not influence auto negotiation at the PHY level. The passed link state must always match the link state returned by cvmx_helper_link_get(). It is normally best to use cvmx_helper_link_autoconf() instead.

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to configure
link_info The new link state
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_agl_probe ( int  interface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Probe a RGMII interface and determine the number of ports connected to it. The RGMII interface should still be down after this call.

Parameters:
interface Interface to probe
Returns:
Number of ports on the interface. Zero to disable.
int cvmx_helper_agl_get_port ( int  xiface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Convert interface to port to assess CSRs.

Parameters:
xiface Interface to probe
Returns:
The port corresponding to the interface
